resources.string: Q1. The response from a REST web service is commonly formatted in one of the common data transfer formats like XML or JSON.
Q2. A device with Android installed is needed to develop apps for Android.
Q3. Google licensed some proprietary apps.
Q4. Android doesn’t make any assumptions about a device’s screen size, resolution, or chipset.
Q5.Android is built upon the Java Micro Edition (J2ME) version of Java.
Q6. Find when you distribute your application commercially, you’ll want to sign it with your own key.
Q7. The response from a REST web service is commonly formatted in one of the common data transfer formats like XML or JSON.
